segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Properties page help determine the behavior of your IAP when offered to customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Properties page help determine the behavior of your IAP when offered to customers.

segment.source: Enter IAP properties
segment.target: Enter IAP properties

segment.source: Enter IAP properties
segment.target: Enter IAP properties

segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Properties page help determine the behavior of your IAP when offered to customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the options on the Properties page help determine the behavior of your IAP when offered to customers.

segment.source: Product type
segment.target: Product type

segment.source: Your product type is selected when you first create the IAP.
segment.target: Your product type is selected when you first create the IAP.

segment.source: The product type you selected is displayed here, but you can't change it.
segment.target: The product type you selected is displayed here, but you can't change it.

segment.source: Note If you haven't published the IAP, you can delete the submission and start again if you need to choose a different product type.
segment.target: Note If you haven't published the IAP, you can delete the submission and start again if you need to choose a different product type.

segment.source: If you selected Durable for your product type, the Product lifetime is shown here.
segment.target: If you selected Durable for your product type, the Product lifetime is shown here.

segment.source: The default Product lifetime for a durable IAP is Forever, which means the IAP never expires.
segment.target: The default Product lifetime for a durable IAP is Forever, which means the IAP never expires.

segment.source: If you prefer, you can set the Product lifetime so that the IAP expires after a set duration (with options from 1-365 days).
segment.target: If you prefer, you can set the Product lifetime so that the IAP expires after a set duration (with options from 1-365 days).

segment.source: Content type
segment.target: Content type

segment.source: Regardless of your IAP's product type, you'll also need to indicate the type of content you're offering.
segment.target: Regardless of your IAP's product type, you'll also need to indicate the type of content you're offering.

segment.source: For most IAPs, the content type should be Electronic software download.
segment.target: For most IAPs, the content type should be Electronic software download.

segment.source: If another option from the list seems to describe your IAP better (for example, if you are offering a music download or an e-book), select that option instead.
segment.target: If another option from the list seems to describe your IAP better (for example, if you are offering a music download or an e-book), select that option instead.

segment.source: These are the possible options for an IAP's content type:
segment.target: These are the possible options for an IAP's content type:

segment.source: Electronic software download
segment.target: Electronic software download

segment.source: Electronic books
segment.target: Electronic books

segment.source: Electronic magazine single issue
segment.target: Electronic magazine single issue

segment.source: Electronic newspaper single issue
segment.target: Electronic newspaper single issue

segment.source: Music download
segment.target: Music download

segment.source: Music streaming
segment.target: Music streaming

segment.source: Online data storage/services
segment.target: Online data storage/services

segment.source: Video download
segment.target: Video download

segment.source: Video streaming
segment.target: Video streaming

segment.source: Software as a service
segment.target: Software as a service

segment.source: Keywords
segment.target: Keywords

segment.source: You have the option to provide up to ten keywords of up to 30 characters each for each IAP you submit.
segment.target: You have the option to provide up to ten keywords of up to 30 characters each for each IAP you submit.

segment.source: Your app can then query for products that match these words.
segment.target: Your app can then query for products that match these words.

segment.source: This feature lets you build screens in your app that can load IAPs without you having to directly specify the product ID in your app's code.
segment.target: This feature lets you build screens in your app that can load IAPs without you having to directly specify the product ID in your app's code.

segment.source: You can then change the IAP's keywords anytime, without having to make code changes in your app or submit the app again.
segment.target: You can then change the IAP's keywords anytime, without having to make code changes in your app or submit the app again.

segment.source: Note Keywords are not available for use in packages targeting Windows 8 and Windows 8.1.
segment.target: Note Keywords are not available for use in packages targeting Windows 8 and Windows 8.1.

segment.source: Tag
segment.target: Tag

segment.source: You can enter up to 3000 characters into the Tag field to provide extra context for your in-app product.
segment.target: You can enter up to 3000 characters into the Tag field to provide extra context for your in-app product.

segment.source: For example, let’s say you have a game, and you’re selling a bag of gold coins as an IAP.
segment.target: For example, let’s say you have a game, and you’re selling a bag of gold coins as an IAP.

segment.source: Using the Tags field, the app can query for this bag of gold.
segment.target: Using the Tags field, the app can query for this bag of gold.

segment.source: You can adjust the value at any time (in this case, the number of coins in your bag) by updating the info in the IAP's Tag field, without having to make code changes in your app or submit the app again.
segment.target: You can adjust the value at any time (in this case, the number of coins in your bag) by updating the info in the IAP's Tag field, without having to make code changes in your app or submit the app again.

segment.source: Note The Tag field is not available for use in packages targeting Windows 8 and Windows 8.1.
segment.target: Note The Tag field is not available for use in packages targeting Windows 8 and Windows 8.1.
